title: (x) Buenos Aires Metro "Subte Seguro" - Frutiger, Frutiger Cond {Marc O}
content:
What’s the font used for the word ‘Subte’ in the image below? This font seems pretty common, but I can’t figure out exactly what it is. The closest I could guess is Myriad, but that seems a little different somehow. Any thoughts? Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/subte-seg-1-ch_3501.jpg)
author: MikeStrong

comments.content:
Frutiger:

Black Condensed for “Subte,” and Bold Condensed for “SEGURO”
